metadata.name: Ghost rides the streets of cyber #1/15
metadata.description:
Young baby Ghost enjoyed playing with his own toy motorcycles, inspired by his family's passion for motorcycle racing. But one day, his mother suggested that he play video games instead of motorcycles. Baby Ghost accepted his mother's suggestion, downloaded several different motorcycle racing games and started playing.A supernatural powered baby finds himself in a video game world while playing a computer game. He discovers a power that transforms him into a robotic warrior and sets out on his own adventure in the game world with his new abilities. As Baby Ghost Rider masters the art of battle, he uses his skills in his robotic body to defeat his enemies. When he finally returns to his own world, he is no longer just a baby, but a powerful warrior. 

"Art work by Erdogan Paksoy"
